items.sentence: Tom just made up that story. It\'s not true.
Tom was embarrassed to have to ask for help.
Mary doesn\'t ever kiss her husband anymore.
Mary said she didn\'t know why Tom was late.
Mary said she didn\'t want to let Tom drive.
Mary said she thought Tom didn\'t like John.
I thought that you were teaching Tom French.
I thought you said you wanted me to do that.
Tom never fully recovered from his injuries.
Tom played the clarinet when he was younger.
Tom isn\'t the one who told Mary to do that.
Tom isn\'t the one who wanted me to do that.
Tom isn\'t the only one here who likes Mary.
Tom began to light the candles on the table.
Tom and Mary are very devoted to each other.
Tom and Mary are very friendly and outgoing.
Tom and Mary are very similar to each other.
Tom says that Mary isn\'t sure she\'s ready.
I don\'t think that Tom will like Australia.
I don\'t think that Tom will like this game.
